channel.title: How much snow did all of you receive?
channel.description:
Well if you guy's/girl's got some snow, how much did you get?
I live in the central U.S and received 5.6in of snow.. plus 1.2in of ice under it.. Since it's dark out side i'll get a picture to show all of you later, but it was bad out, the snow plow's weren't doing shit and the roads were iced over and when we switched county's the road's got ALOT better...

item.title: How much snow did all of you receive?
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

0 england rocks your soxs

Read full topic

@XharveyX wrote:

You even try get snow in weston-super-mare… it always rains, which suprised me cuz our pier caught fire on a nice day…

item.source: How much snow did all of you receive?

item.title: How much snow did all of you receive?
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“King Redrum, post:25, topic:252738”][quote author=masta XY link=topic=333843.msg2600548#msg2600548 date=1230195149]

    • Virginia, U.S. We’ll probably get snowed in fucking February or January.

OMG, I live in VIRGINIA YAY

:o Cocoa lives in Virginia? Never knew this. <_<

0 - Norway, Bergen

Gah, isn’t it like umm alway’s snowing there?

No…Why do people always thing that Norway is like the north pole?

I haven’t seen Santa around lately

Lol, well because on the new’s it is all way’s talking about how Norway and Germany gets the most snow…

Wtf, it havent snowed like …November, and that didn’t last more than max 1 week. Atleast in Bergen, which is known for it’s yearly amount of rain.

See it snow’s when we dont get any…

Ya, you can’t be stealing snowz…

Lol you started a quote pyramid… also I want 50in of snow… that would be pimp.

50IN’s of snow would be fun. <_<

imagine the snow boarding.
[/quote]

That would be so much fun snow boarding with 50IN’s of snow… I would feel sorry for the midgets and short people though, 4 Feet of snow you wouldn’t be able to see them…wait… that may make it easier on them to take over the world… NO 50IN snow! >_o[/quote]

Haha we all might die from midgets!!

Read full topic
